name: Biokkoin
description: BIOKKOIN is a unique digital asset, with its intrinsic value backed by land bank worth over $70m. BKK Global is equitizing the global real estate space with BIOKKOIN as its cryptoasset of an evolved blockchain that encourages to lend, borrow, stake Real Estate DeFi through the development of a new communiqué and governance protocol. It is the company’s mission to deliver value creating spaces and its endeavours epitomize this philosophy.
